body:
Isn't this function invoked only when `delim` is the empty string? 
I realize that you're perhaps adding a more general function, but would it make sense to not have this function in `str_util.h` but instead inline a function to split into UTF8 characters when the delimiter is empty in the anonymous namespace in `kernels/string_split_op.cc`?
body_html:
Isn't this function invoked only when delim is the empty string?
I realize that you're perhaps adding a more general function, but would it make sense to not have this function in str_util.h but instead inline a function to split into UTF8 characters when the delimiter is empty in the anonymous namespace in kernels/string_split_op.cc?
body_text:
Isn't this function invoked only when delim is the empty string?
I realize that you're perhaps adding a more general function, but would it make sense to not have this function in str_util.h but instead inline a function to split into UTF8 characters when the delimiter is empty in the anonymous namespace in kernels/string_split_op.cc?
